attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: dear everyone i have just gone 15 and have set up a business now i really do feel that it is unfair that i of a really young age have to pay tax as the goverment should be encouraging people to do more business of people under the age of 16 and it gives me life skills but it is really putting me off doing it as it is relly sacry for me to pay tax

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
